comment.author: 60789956@N02
comment._content: This photo is particulary interesting, as My fathers family lived here not long after. My father was born in 1928, and his parents and elder sister had been living there for at least 5 years prior to his birth. Their name was Plank.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/60789956@N02] Thanks for your comment; you might be interested in a couple more images of Macquarie Vale on our catalogue, Photo Investigator.
